paragraph: Sten & Stanley are a dansband from Karlskoga, Sweden. Established in 1962, the band has scored several Svensktoppen hits, including their signature song Jag vill vara din, Margareta. Their hit song "Dra dit pepparn växer" was translated into English and won the Castlebar Song Contest in 1985.
Sten Nilsson & Sten & Stanleys kör och orkester 1969
Som ett ljus. Musik, dans & party 5 1990
